bool ting::Timer::Stop (  )  [inline]

Stop the timer.

Stops the timer if it was started before. In case it was not started or it is already expired this method does nothing.

Returns:
true - if the timer was successfuly interrupted. I.e. it was in running state and has not expired at the time this method was called.
false - if the timer was not in running state (either not started or already expired) at the moment this method was called.
